title: Diego Marques Coelho
text:
Bio













Holds a degree in Biological Sciences from the State University of Rio de Janeiro (2013), a master’s degree in Biological Sciences (Biophysics) from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (2016), and a Ph.D. in Bioinformatics from the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte (2018 and 2021). His most recent academic work focused on the use of scRNAseq and RNAseq data to address questions related to developmental neurobiology and the neuropathology of Alzheimer’s disease. He has worked for Mendelics S/A as a bioinformatics analyst and at EMBL-EBI as a bioinformatics developer. Currently, he works at Ryvu Therapeutics and collaborates with researchers and biotechnology companies.

title: Welcome to Marques-Coelho Bioinformatics Lab
text:
Welcome to Marques-Coelho Bioinformatics Lab
Welcome to the official resource hub for coding projects at MCB Labs. Here, you will find comprehensive access to our lectures, research projects, development proposals, scientific publications, and a variety of other materials related to our ongoing work. Whether you’re a student, collaborator, or visitor, this site is designed to support exploration, collaboration, and innovation in the field of molecular and computational biology.
